CPixelate.cpp

00001 /*
00002  * CPixelate.cpp
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 09.03.2010
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  Pixelate Effect. This effect appears, when in Keen 4
00008  *  you are beginning to see the main title screen.
00009  *  The pixelation you there, is that effect coded here!
00010  */
00011 
00012 #include "CPixelate.h"
00013 #include "../../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00014 #include "../../sdl/CInput.h"
00015 
00016 CPixelate::CPixelate(unsigned short speed) :
00017 mp_OldSurface(NULL),
00018 mp_NewSurface(NULL),
00019 m_speed(speed)
00020 {
00021  SDL_Rect gameres = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00022  getSnapshot();
00023 
00024  m_line = 0;
00025  m_lines_completed = 0;
00026  m_drawmap = new bool[gameres.h*gameres.w];
00027  m_pixels_per_line = new unsigned short[gameres.h];
00028 
00029  for(size_t y=0 ; y<gameres.h ; y++)
00030  {
00031   m_pixels_per_line[y] = 0;
00032   for(size_t x=0 ; x<gameres.w ; x++)
00033    m_drawmap[y*gameres.w+x] = false;
00034  }
00035 }
00036 
00037 // get the Snapshot of the old surface, so the the effect can be applied on it!
00038 void CPixelate::getSnapshot()
00039 {
00040  g_pVideoDriver->collectSurfaces();
00041  if(!mp_OldSurface) mp_OldSurface = SDL_DisplayFormat(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface);
00042 }
00043 
00044 // Effect cycle
00045 void CPixelate::process()
00046 {
00047  Uint8 *pixelstart;
00048  Uint8 *pixel;
00049  Uint16 x;
00050 
00051  SDL_Rect gameres = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00052 
00053  if(mp_NewSurface == NULL)
00054  {
00055   // Get the a snapshot of the second surface which will be the destination.
00056   mp_NewSurface = SDL_DisplayFormat(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface);
00057  }
00058 
00059  SDL_LockSurface(mp_NewSurface);
00060  SDL_LockSurface(mp_OldSurface);
00061 
00062  // This is the algorithm for drawing the effect. It was invented by myself, so no guarantee,
00063  // it will look the same as in Keen Galaxy. We will see, when it's finished
00064  for(unsigned short y=m_lines_completed ; y<m_line ; y++)
00065  {
00066   // Get pointer at start of the line we are now
00067   pixelstart = static_cast<Uint8*> (mp_NewSurface->pixels) + y*mp_NewSurface->pitch;
00068 
00069   for(unsigned short drawamt=0 ; drawamt < m_speed ; drawamt++ )
00070   {
00071    do
00072    { // get a random pixel between 0 and 320 which has not yet been occupied
00073     x = rand()%gameres.w;
00074    } while( m_drawmap[(Uint32)(y*gameres.w + x)] );
00075 
00076    // The y line gets one pixel painted at random x, between 0 and 320.
00077    pixel = pixelstart + x*mp_OldSurface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00078    m_pixels_per_line[y]++;
00079    m_drawmap[y*gameres.w + x] = true;
00080 
00081    memcpy(static_cast<Uint8*> (mp_OldSurface->pixels) + y*mp_OldSurface->pitch + x*mp_OldSurface->format->BytesPerPixel,
00082      pixel, mp_OldSurface->format->BytesPerPixel);
00083 
00084    // If there are no more pixels to draw in this line, m_lines_completed++, it won't be scanned again.
00085    // This will be checked against m_pixels_per_line
00086    if(m_pixels_per_line[y] >= gameres.w )
00087    {
00088     m_lines_completed++;
00089     break;
00090    }
00091   }
00092  }
00093 
00094  SDL_UnlockSurface(mp_OldSurface);
00095  SDL_UnlockSurface(mp_NewSurface);
00096 
00097  if(m_line < gameres.h)
00098  {
00099   m_line+=m_speed;
00100   if(m_line > gameres.h) m_line=gameres.h;
00101  }
00102 
00103  if( m_lines_completed >= m_line )
00104  {
00105   // In this case the algorithm has finished
00106   m_finished = true;
00107  }
00108 
00109  SDL_BlitSurface( mp_OldSurface, &gameres, g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, &gameres);
00110 }
00111 
00112 CPixelate::~CPixelate()
00113 {
00114  delete [] m_drawmap;
00115  delete [] m_pixels_per_line;
00116  if(mp_OldSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(mp_OldSurface);
00117  if(mp_NewSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(mp_NewSurface);
00118 }
